name: Prosciutto Wrapped Asparagus with Cheese
author: clarkie24
summary: I was looking for a different way to serve one of my favorite vegetables and this is it! Provolone cheese provides a mild flavor, but if you'd like a stronger flavor, use smoked Cheddar cheese.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Fill a large bowl with ice and cold water
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add asparagus and briefly cook uncovered until just beginning to soften, about 1 minute
Drain in a colander and immediately immerse in ice water for several minutes to stop the cooking process
Drain and season with salt and pepper
Bunch the spears into groups of 5
Place a slice of provolone cheese over the top of each bunch
Wrap a slice of prosciutto, starting at the base of the spears, around the spear-cheese package and secure with a toothpick
Preheat an outdoor grill for medium heat and lightly oil the grate
Place each wrapped asparagus bunch on the grill
Grill until prosciutto is crispy and cheese is melted, about 5 minutes
